High Priest Orven:

We have to prepare to the rite properly.

Go to the Sel Mahum Base and kill 1000 monsters roaming there. Monsters to hunt: Sel Mahum Sniper, Sel Mahum Raider, Sel Mahum Berserker, Sel Mahum Mage, Sel Mahum Thief, Sel Mahum Wizard, Sel Mahum Knight, Sel Mahum Footman, Sel Mahum Bowman.

Come back after dealing with monsters.
